articles.author: Chris Isidore
articles.title: America is already feeling the consequences of a looming nationwide rail strike - CNN
articles.description: America's freight railroads have already stopped accepting shipments of hazardous and other security-sensitive materials because of the looming threat of a strike Friday.
articles.content:
